changeSet.author: Jayxunbey
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE contract ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255), phone VARCHAR(255), passport_series VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, jshshir VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, contract_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, contract_date TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, contract_expiration_date TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, CONSTRAINT pk_contract PRIMARY KEY (id) );
